title: I Can Track Everything - Novel Updates
tags: Alchemy   Cheats   Comedic Undertone   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Dao Companion   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Engagement   Fast Cultivation   Immortals   Leadership   Long Separations   Loyal Subordinates   Lucky Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Master-Disciple Relationship   Misunderstandings   Modern Knowledge   Poor Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Romantic Subplot   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sect Development   Shameless Protagonist   Strong to Stronger   System Administrator   Trickster   Weak to Strong
author: Sanmao Wu
description:
Traveling through the Xianxia world, Chen Chen got the strongest tracking system and was able to track everything ever since. 

Chen Chen, 'System, I am short of money.' 'Two meters away, your father has hidden some money under the bed. Five meters away, there is a rusty copper coin buried half a meter underground.' 'There is a piece of silver in the grass ahead.' 

Chen Chen, 'System, I need some luck.' 'The sh*t in front of the pigsty is actually not ordinary.' 'Go to Black Peak cliff twenty miles away to jump off the cliff.' 'Somewhere hidden there is a fairy cave mansion. Please explore by yourself.'>
